title: For Sale: $3500 CAROLINA BRIGHTS Shad Barry T206 PSA 3.5 highest grade

posts.post_title: For Sale: $3500 CAROLINA BRIGHTS Shad Barry T206 PSA 3.5 highest grade
posts.post_content:
5 examples graded by PSA and SGC.  3.5 is the highest grade for both companies, with one example graded by each one.  No creases, newly graded, well centered.  Paypal F/F price includes free Priority Mail insured shipping.
Thanks. Len
